bug.author: syncle
bug.description:
Describe the bug FGR class has default parameter set, but they are not correctly assigned to the class. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/IntelVCL/Open3D/blob/4e3b06026c2e51415400771254b308c97b0aab3a/src/Core/Registration/FastGlobalRegistration.h#L43-L55>https://github.com/IntelVCL/Open3D/blob/4e3b06026c2e51415400771254b308c97b0aab3a/src/Core/Registration/FastGlobalRegistration.h#L43-L55</denchmark-link>
The value decrease_mu and maximum_correspondence_distance will not be set.
